attributes.action: Start the process of rejoining the European Union
attributes.additional_details: It is providing more freedom around Europe.It is also improving economically as the EU is the world's largest trading bloc.
attributes.background: Make an attempt to rejoin the EU to have another election.

rejection.details:
It is unclear whether you would like the Government to seek to rejoin the EU, or whether you would like an election, or another referendum on EU membership.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may be interested in signing the following petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
